Text:
Thank you Oh so very much!! :D
Will seed this...

WARNING file seems to be broken at 00:17:38, and then again at about 44, 53 and 54 minutes--that's when I quit watching.

Tried it with players vlc, mplayer and xine with same results. Output from mplayer (at 17 min):
[mpeg4 @ 0x89bf470]header damaged  0.233 25457/25457  0%  0%  0.7% 0 0 55%
Error while decoding frame!

Some few seconds or minutes not playable after each error.

Thanks anyhow. Will keep seeding, maybe somebody knows a workaround for this?

As stated above, the film certainly does look brilliant.  But is this version really watchable?  I got so sick of constantly having to skip over corrupt bits, I gave up after halfway, and am now DLing the big seeded version.  From what I have already seen, I'm sure this movie is worth the effort.  I might convert it to avi and re-seed, once I have DL'd it.
The film is broken several of times...:-(
